data.title: Hotel Shima Spain Mura - Shima, JP Meeting Venues and Event Space
data.meta_description: Located at Sakazaki Isobe-cho, Shima, Hotel Shima Spain Mura boasts 249 spacious Spanish style rooms with extensive facilities along with it. We can provide the right venue for your get-together including large & small gatherings.
data.text:
More

Located at Sakazaki Isobe-cho, Shima, Hotel Shima Spain Mura boasts 249 spacious Spanish style rooms with extensive facilities along with it. We can provide the right venue for your get-together, whether it be a larger event like a class reunion or a smaller ones like conferences and exhibits. Take advantage of the beautiful facilities and the culinary delights prepared by our experienced staff.
